content.rendered:
U.S. Real Estate Token
Contract Address
Quick Start Guide

What is LendrUSRE?

LendrUSRE (USRE) is the world’s first synthetic U.S. real estate token. USRE price growth matches the U.S. real estate market.

Our Quick Start Guide will show you how to start building wealth with USRE in less than 5 minutes.

Video Guides
“90% of all millionaires become wealthy through owning real estate.”
- Andrew Carnegie
Billionaire Industrialist

LendrUSRE is the simplest way to access the most common way to become wealthy.

⚠️ You can try the Lendr system nearly risk-free with the Lendr “Love It or Leave Free” Guarantee! 

LendrUSRE vs Standard Real Estate

Learn How LendrUSRE Can Save You $231,795+

The U.S. real estate market is worth over 45 trillion dollars, that is 45x the entire crypto market! However, it is largely inaccessible to most people due to high barriers to entry (cost, location, etc.).

LendrUSRE fixes these issues, giving you instant access to one of the greatest asset classes in the world.

How Lendr Can Save $231,795 vs Standard Real Estate:

🏅 LendrUSRE Standard Real Estate

Interest Rate:

⭐ 0% Interest Rate
(Value: ~$169,390 Saved vs Avg. Home Loan)

• Ongoing Interest Rate (7%+)

Closing Costs:

⭐ One-Time Borrowing Fee (As low as 0.5%)
(Value: ~$6,905 Saved on Avg.)

• Closing Costs (3%-6%)

Maintenance Costs:

⭐ No Maintenance Costs
(Value: ~$1,850/yr Saved on Avg.)

• ~1% of the Home's Value per Year
• Insurance
• Property Taxes
• Management Time

Speed:

⭐ Instant Buy, Sell, Send, Etc.
(Value: Weeks of Time Saved)

• Closing Time: 45-60 Days

Additional Returns:

⭐ 100% of DeFi Lending Revenue Sent to Staking Pool
⭐ DeFi Liquidity Revenue
⭐ Lendr Global Reward Pool
⭐ Crypto Collateral Exposure
(Value: Compounding Defi Lending, Crypto, and Real Estate Returns)

• Renters (Must be managed)
🏅 LendrUSRE Standard Real Estate

Interest Rate:

⭐ 0% Interest Rate
(Value: ~$169,390 Saved vs Avg. Home Loan)

• Ongoing Interest Rate (7%+)

Closing Costs:

⭐ One-Time Borrowing Fee (As low as 0.5%)
(Value: ~$6,905 Saved on Avg.)

• Closing Costs (3%-6%)

Maintenance Costs:

⭐ No Maintenance Costs
(Value: ~$1,850/yr Saved on Avg.)

• ~1% of the Home's Value per Year
• Insurance
• Property Taxes
• Management Time

Speed:

⭐ Instant Buy, Sell, Send, Etc.
(Value: Weeks of Time Saved)

• Closing Time: 45-60 Days

Other Benefits:
⭐ Compounding Defi Lending, Crypto, and Real Estate Returns

That is over $231,795 in savings! Plus time saved, risk reductions, and additional defi earnings!

Quick Start Guide
DeFi Lending Dapp

Example Investment

LendrUSRE vs S&P500, DeFi Lending, and US Real Estate
🏅 LendrUSRE US Housing Real Estate Stablecoin Lending S&P500

Approx APR/APY:

⭐ ~21.13% (Combined APR)

~4.249% (Housing CPI) + 8% (Avg. Rental ROI)

2-5% (Avg. APR)

11.88% (Avg. Annualized Return)

Approx 5 Year Return: ($100,000 initial investment)

⭐ $287,013.56

~$183,922.69

$128,387.12

$175,292.08

Compared to Lendr:

⭐ 

-$-103,090.87 vs Lendr

-$158,626.44 vs Lendr

-$111,721.48 vs Lendr

How is this possible? Have a look at how Lendr achieves this APR:

  • Lendr Network APR* = ~5% (DeFi Lending APR) + 4.249% (US Housing Real Estate) + 11.90% (ETH YoY Returns) = ~21.13% Combined APR

This estimation does not include our early adopter rewards or liquidation/redemption gains.

DeFi Lending Dapp
Quick Start Guide

LendrR - Reward Token

Collect the Revenue Generated By USRE Loans!

LendrR (LNDRr) is the reward token for LendrUSRE.

  • 100% of the fees generated by USRE loans are sent to the LendrR staking pool.
  • LendrR has a limited supply, no new tokens can be minted!
  • Early adopter rewards: Stability Pool rewards are greater at launch and reduce over time! 

You can earn LendrR by staking USRE in the Stability Pool.

The Lendr Global Reward Pool shares rewards from all Lendr Stablecoins to all Lendr Reward tokens!

LendrR is the reward token for LendrUSRE.

  • 100% of the fees generated by USRE loans are sent to the LendrR staking pool.
  • LendrR has a limited supply, no new tokens can be minted!
  • Early adopter rewards: Stability Pool rewards are greater at launch and reduce over time! 

You can earn LendrR by staking USRE in the Stability Pool.

The Lendr Global Reward Pool shares rewards from all Lendr Stablecoins to all Lendr Reward tokens!

Listings

Contract Address
Buy Now

Testimonials

Antony Mullins Community Member

"The fastest, safest way to get U.S. real estate and defi lending returns at the same time!"

Keenan Chen Real Estate Investor

"Real estate investing without any of the hassle."

Malakai R. Community Member

"A stablecoin that earns you money, perfect for a bear market."

Mohammed E. Community Member

"Where else can you find a 0% interest loan on a real estate property? Plus you can stake to earn even more."

Scott Dalton Multi-Asset Investor

"Real estate was already the best hedge against inflation, now its even better."

Candice Trujillo Home Owner

"Made real estate investing easy enough for anyone."

Ali Thomson Real Estate Investor

"No need to pick properties or hunt for deals. No chance of accidentally buying a terrible property."

Brett Yoder Community Member

"No other investment compounds defi loans and real estate. "

Rehan Meza

"Anyone anywhere can invest any amount of money into real estate with USRE"

LendrUSRE Features

Instant Access to One of the World’s Greatest Asset Classes
US Real Estate Stablecoin
0% Interest Loans
Earn With DeFi Lending Rewards
Backed by 110%+ Collateral
Supports Global Initiatives
Portfolio Diversification
Lendr Global Reward Pool
Lendr Money Back Guarantee
US Real Estate Stablecoin

US Real Estate Stablecoin

  • LendrUSRE is a stablecoin pegged to the US real estate market. 
  • USRE earns the same returns as the US real estate market and additional returns from DeFi lending.
  • USRE is a stablecoin, unaffected by bear markets.

The US real estate market is more than 40x larger than the total crypto market.

0% Interest Loans

0% Interest Loans

  • Users can create LendrUSRE by opening a loan (trove) with 0% interest and no deadline to return the loan. 
Earn With DeFi Lending Rewards

DeFi Lending Rewards

  • Lendr allows users to earn money through our defi lending platform.
  • 100% of fees from the lending platform are sent to stakers (and front end operators).
  • Stakers can withdraw at any time. There are no fees to stake or unstake in any Lendr pool.
  • Start now with our quick start video guides!
Backed by 110%+ Collateral

110%+ Collateral Ratio

  • All Lendr stablecoins are backed by at least 110% on-chain collateral.
Supports Global Initiatives

Supports Global Initiatives

The protocol aims to give back to the global community by staking 0.5% of the LNDRr total supply in the reward pool.

The rewards generated from those tokens will be reserved for altruistic purposes. 

Portfolio Diversification

Portfolio Diversification

LendrUSRE allows holders to diversify their portfolio, gaining exposure to the US real estate market without having to leave the crypto space. 

Lendr Global Reward Pool

Lendr Global Reward Pool

The Lendr Global Reward Pool shares rewards from all Lendr Stablecoins across all Lendr Reward tokens. 

This means buying any Lendr reward token is like buying all Lendr reward tokens.

Pick your favorite network and benefit from all our token launches! Learn more here.

Lendr Money Back Guarantee
We want to make trying the Lendr platform as risk-free as possible, so we created the Lendr Money Back Guarantee!
 
How it works:
  • Open a trove and stake any of our stablecoins to earn rewards.
  • If you are not happy you can contact our team within 5 days of opening your trove and we will help you close your trove and cover your issuance fee up to $100 USD.
  • Learn more here.

To learn more please visit our Youtube Channel to watch the Lendr Network FAQ Series or read our Documentation.

*Lendr returns calculated with weekly compounding. This is for estimation purposes only, APRs vary based on multiple factors, returns are not guaranteed and there are inherent risks associated with crypto investments. View our disclaimer for more information.
